meanings.definition: A person who owns or operates a restaurant.
meanings.sent1: The restauranteurs in town are known for their delicious food.
meanings.sent2: The group of restauranteurs decided to open a new restaurant together.
meanings.sent3: The restauranteurs were so busy, they accidentally served dessert before the main course!
meanings.sent4: The restauranteurs were like conductors, orchestrating a symphony of flavors in their restaurant.
meanings.sent5: The restauranteurs' passion for food shone through in every dish they served.
